name: Winter Wishes
description:
The time has come for Christmas cheer!
And thus people send out their heartfelt wishes
to one another, with every year.

Some are modest, some are grand. Guide them to safety,
in the waters of these snow-blanketed lands!

Liked the game? Fill in this anonymous survey to inform the developers about its potential! https://forms.gle/oHDLWqH4BTsfSqor6

Take the bottles containing precious wishes to shore safely! Dodge rocks and make use of currents to nimbly maneuver the bottle to its destination.

All you need to do is click with the left mouse button!

Music and Sound Design: Tyas van den Bergh
https://www.sound-potion.com/

A thank you to Meike Arts, for aiding our artists in the development of art assets.
https://www.instagram.com/meikes.art/?hl=nl
